content.title: Learning Objectives
content.intro: If you only have space to remember 3 things:

objectives.title: Grounding M&E in the local context
objectives.description: Understand the local context to ensure that M&E is relevant and useful.

objectives.title: Engaging stakeholders
objectives.description: Involve stakeholders in the M&E process to ensure that it meets their needs.

objectives.title: Using data for decision-making
objectives.description: Use data to inform decisions and improve programs.
